question.xref: DES s18, HC r258, HC r269
question.text: You are on a motorway. A red cross is displayed above the hard shoulder. What does this mean?

explanation.text: Active Traffic Management schemes are being introduced on motorways. Within these areas at certain times the hard shoulder will be used as a running lane. A red cross above the hard shoulder shows that this lane should NOT be used, except for emergencies and breakdowns.

answer.text: Pull up in this lane to answer your mobile phone
Use this lane as a running lane
This lane can be used if you need a rest
You should not travel in this lane
